title: Major disruption on East West Line due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线因轨道故障造成重大中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan besar di Laluan Timur Barat kerana kerosakan landasan
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் பெரிய இடையூறு

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Free regular bus svcs between #OutramPark and #Bugis have ended.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train service from #OutramPark to #Bugis has resumed. Free regular bus svcs from #OutramPark to #Bugis is available. Our station staff will assist.
[EWL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 20mins train travel time from #OutramPark to #Bugis towards #PasirRis. Free regular bus svcs btwn #OutramPark and #Bugis. Our station staff will assist.
